Detailed Description

ShortTimeCorrInputRef:.

like DeltaCorrInputRef but one event impacts the next timestep as well

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef CorrInputMech<ShortTimeCorrInputRef> ShortTimeCorrInputRef::related_component

Type related to this configurator type.

Used for automated construction of neurons from configurators. See NeuronFactory and SynapseFactory.
